CustomField.description: IF( OR( Material_Status__c = "40", Material_Status__c = "60", Material_Status__c = "Z1", Material_Status__c = "Z8", AND(Material_Status__c = "Z5", List_Price__c > 0.0), ISBLANK(Material_Status__c) ),0,1)
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Material_Status__c = "40", Material_Status__c = "60", Material_Status__c = "Z1", Material_Status__c = "Z8", Material_Status__c = "ZT", Material_Status__c = "ZE", Material_Status__c = "Z7", Material_Status__c = "TE", Material_Name_Text__c == 'CDC-35541-TTS', Material_Name_Text__c == 'CDC-35552-TTS', Material_Name_Text__c == 'CDC-35563-TTS', Material_Name_Text__c == 'CDC-45541-TTS', Material_Name_Text__c == 'CDC-45552-TTS', Material_Name_Text__c == 'CDC-45563-TTS', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-BAT', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-ECGA-1', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-ECGA-5', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-ECGJ', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-ECGO', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-ECGPC', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-ECGPC', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-PRNL-A', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-PRNL-A', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-PWRC-B', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-RC', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-100-TP', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY-177-TTSAP', Material_Name_Text__c == 'RHY–100–PRNC', Material_Name_Text__c == 'SGS23R', Material_Name_Text__c == 'SGS23Rb', Material_Name_Text__c == 'SPU01', Material_Name_Text__c == 'SB38', Material_Name_Text__c == 'ST19', Material_Name_Text__c == 'SBHP', Material_Name_Text__c == '532215', Material_Name_Text__c == '532215S', Material_Name_Text__c == '532217', Material_Name_Text__c == '532217S', Material_Name_Text__c == '537215', Material_Name_Text__c == '538215', Material_Name_Text__c == '539215', AND( Material_Status__c = "Z5", List_Price__c > 0.0), ISBLANK(Material_Status__c ) /* End of OR */ ),0,1)
CustomField.label: Material Status Check
